lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get into our session tonight, we do have some announcements to get through, beginning with the first of our two sponsors this evening, Hit Point Press! Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sam Riegel, number one Army at the table, here to drop that Bangtan Bomb on you! Let's get #BTSCR trending!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, I said Hit Point Press, not BTS.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: J-Hope, Jimin, Vee, and the Golden Maknae, Jungkook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all about frightening and delighting the carnival goers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Frightening and delighting fans, that sounds like seven boys who shine through the city with a little funk and soul and light it up like dynamite! I'm talking about my Bulletproof Boy Scouts, woo woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The book and box set are 20% off right now at bit.ly/crheckna, and thank you so much for your support.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And remember what Hit Point Press always says: The reason we shine is because you give us the light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, does Hit Point Press actually--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Matt, that was a quote from Jungkook from BTS! I know I'm a couple days late, but happy 23rd birthday, Jungkook! I purple you! #BTSCR forever. Back to you, Matt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that why your hair is that color? Did you do it lighter because of that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I'm a huge BTS fan, and not because I just wanted an excuse for Matt to read the ad for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't even know half of what you said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I promise you that the Army is going to get online and make that hashtag shine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but seriously, Dynamite is a really good song.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, thank you, Hit Point Press. Hit Point Press.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that what you were listening to whenever--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was rocking out to it in the car when Marisha pulled up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled down my window, and I was like, "Yeah!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So anyway, our second sponsor tonight, our friends since the beginning of the Campaign 2, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first up I have after that is for Brian, Brian, for Brian.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Pardon me, you beautiful yet dangerous woman, while I make this announcement.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's true, what many of you have heard, especially from Marisha.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Critical Role's flagship show is coming back.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It says it right here! Critical Role's flagship show, it says right here, is coming back to the internet this Tuesday.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's a new format, it's going to air every other week, it's going to be pre-recorded, and we're going to be discussing events that have happened all the way from when you guys came back from the hiatus all the way up until this very moment and this very episode.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sell me a jet ski or something.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That you're watching right now, what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sell you something off the back of a motorboat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that kid from Stranger Things with the really big hair?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, he wishes it's still going to be this thick when he's 46, like me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of reminded me of the Bill Paxton character in True Lies that Arnold just decks out.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I do pee myself when I'm scared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what it was, that's what it was.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's also the flagship show for the podcast network, one week later. That's my time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry, Laura looks at me like that when I get that close to her, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get back in your cage now, Brian, thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just lock yourself in, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Brian, and I believe--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, I believe you have some things to talk about, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, I did! So our friends at Wyrmwood, dun dun dun, have a Critical Role dice vault, and a Critical Role tabletop vault now available, and I'm going to show them to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They have it in cherry wood, ooh, with the CR engraving on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or in-- am I saying this right? In Bavarian, nope, Bolivian rosewood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm, so yeah, check it out, it's on their website, wyrmwoodgaming.com, available now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then, in addition to that, the thousand piece puzzle by our friends at The Op are now available in the UK and the Australian shop, so check it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, last we left off: The Mighty Nein had done their preparation for the coming event of Traveler Con.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The golden dick was found and permanently affixed to the hand of Celia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Afterward, you went ahead and made your way to Nicodranas, but Ashley, you said there was something you wanted to do before you guys--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would love to get a tattoo before Orly leaves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh right, because you don't have one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So before you left for Nicodranas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stopping Orly for a brief bit, he excitedly comes to you as you approach, he's like, "Mm, how can I help you?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was wondering if I could get a tattoo, maybe something that would start here and then sort of make its way down my arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What sort of i-m-m-mage are you thinking?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Runes. I'm thinking I would like to spell out in runes Orphan Maker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now what "m-m-material are you looking to imbue?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if you got the dust, you gonna let me know." Do you guys have enough emeralds for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Emerald is the bonus to dexterity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, let me look, let me look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we got a big emerald.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we got that big emerald from--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got a bag-o-gems worth a lot of money that I can dig out a bunch of emeralds from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, do you know how much-- Did I tell you how much the larger emerald was worth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The large emerald you said was worth 250 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then the bag of gems, I think the total worth, now, is around 2,000.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much emerald does she need?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, of pure emerald. Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet we have some more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can the wizard do some sort of transmute-y thingy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you turn some of the gems into emeralds?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I've got residuum. Does that help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Residuum could take the place of some of that, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much emerald dust would you say we can make from our bag-o-gems and the big emerald?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say a little over half, so like 1,200 from the bag, and then you have the other ruby, so 1,450 between the two of those, so you're-- need about 750.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have some residuum you gave me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, we didn't use our residuum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I gave you a hundred, I think--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- and I kept the other seven.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Using all of this for my tattoo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dude, this shit is worth it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are all going to the parlor with you, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a bad idea give away this residuum, like if we need it for reviving someone or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what diamonds are for, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But, you know, if we run out of diamonds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have to buy some more diamonds at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll buy some stuff in Nicodranas.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but isn't residuum very hard to come by?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, we just found it in a bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a mineral, like anything else.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does anybody else want to get a tattoo, or...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the big emerald was 2,500 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think, Matt? You think maybe I wrote it down wrong?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you just left an 0 off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a pretty big emerald we found, wasn't it? I mean, it was legendary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just trying to make this tattoo happen for our friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I understand. Well, it seems like you guys have the means of doing some.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got the residuum. We got this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we trade Orly some drugs, like a really cool tattoo parlor?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do have a lot of suude.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need any whiskey to numb the pain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guide him as he goes, and give what the inspiration is for the different shapes around the runes of Orphan Maker, if there's anything specific to that you'd like to embellish on, he imparts it within your skin.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think maybe some vines with some flowers weaving through the runes and sort of all the way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the tip of the finger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like it. Okay, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I don't mean to brag, but "I had a lot of time to myself on the shore, "just waiting, so I like to sketch."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, best we start getting our folks together "and m-m-make our way back." So that is a permanent plus one to your dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Mighty Nein, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feels good to be in civilization again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sort of blithely unaware of the islands that are just out there, full of crazy shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to make sure we have somewhere to sleep tonight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We always have somewhere to sleep in Nicodranas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Want to shop? Do we want to find people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could make beautiful dresses for horses again, it was a good way to spend money last time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I missed that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like that's the sort of thing I would've noticed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had a carriage when I first left here, and it was the most glamorous carriage you could ever imagine, and I had horses with dresses that took me around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! It was a dumb purchase, but I think worth it, at the time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the dress stop around the midsection, or does it make it down all four legs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will stop by to see your mother for a bit, and then are we going straight to Zadash, or one of the Cobalt Reserve locations?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were going to do some research on stuff, on Nine Eyes, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But also with a mind towards heading towards the baddies, the Rexxentrums.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were going to check in with Jester's mother, with your family--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With the libraries at home, and then maybe see about picking up a little extra work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know, you get points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get free food, free craft service.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you play thugs and stuff? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So where are we going after this, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am highly in need of high quality--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It has been a while since I've been anywhere near a storefront or a bookstore, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm sure we could restock up on supplies, and I'm sure there are curio shops and places to get interesting doodads and lots of things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to let her know that we're here in advance, or?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't want to let her know that we're here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But after a couple of stops, you manage to cobble together-- how much do you need, by the way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to spend 100 platinum on paper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you going to carry that much paper?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a pallet of paper? Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got a bag of holding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have the Vault of Amber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have to go looking in another location.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to check out for some diamonds if we can find any diamonds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little bit of saffron, because I'm starting to run low on my mushroom stuff, and if there's anywhere I can find a five-gold token of the Wild Mother for some other stuff that's coming up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of places that have varying scales of worship, from small carts on the side of the road, people sell all sorts of trinkets and baubles to represent different members of the Prime Deity circle, to a number of temples that are specifically to the Wild Mother, who's a very important figure in a bay, and a coastal ship, to the point where the lighthouse here is a massive visage of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saffron, it's a little harder to find than in inland locations, especially something so close to the ocean, but it is findable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About as much of a trek to get all the paper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Diamonds, I suppose, if there's any.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you looking for diamond dust or solid diamonds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In a spell that takes 1000 gold worth of diamond, can you use multiple diamonds to make that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1000 gold worth of diamonds, unless it says specifically, it says "a diamond worth."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it's specifies a singular diamond, then that's a challenge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should've gone to those mines.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, you say that, and you're right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So then you have to find an actual, a singular stone that is worth that much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would there be 1000-gold diamonds in those mines that we didn't go into?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That being the case, with a little bit of research, you can find--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would know the fancy shops.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beyond that, you can find three others that are worth 300, and another two that are worth 500, depending on what you purchase..

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so we'll get the 1000-gold diamond one--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll toss in some too, because, for my tattoo, so I can help with the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, if you want to toss in another 500 then we can get all of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're just going to get both the 500 gold ones and the 1000 gold one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, yeah, you bought all the diamonds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As if you weren't already making friends here, there are a couple of local jewelers that are very happy to have you as patrons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and I remind them to visit the Lavish Chateau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you all magic meld two 500-gold diamonds into one 1,000-gold diamond?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think it works that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know how magic works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But maybe Caleb could, I don't know what things--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you can use multiple diamonds for some of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then diamond dust for Greater Restoration's a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I could make you one large, lumpy diamond worth less than what you started with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of us have healing potions?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should probably find a store nearby that has some.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where would I go to get something enchanted? Is there such a store here? And would it be the same place that someone else is going, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the point where, in Zadash, the only really major magical item broker that you've encountered there was Pumat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did I get that? Was that in Zadash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had that made by Pumat, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I guess I can remove my penis party favors from my inventory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I imagine you saved a few of them.-

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you have to have one for the scrapbook, for the shadowbox that you make later on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Penis party favor, you got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no longer a plethora of penis party favors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have better luck in larger cities, like Zadash or Rexxentrum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could, if I just wanted some incense, or a glowing-- or a phosphorescent material, would Caleb be able to pick that up for me, where he went?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he could probably do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, get me some incense, or some "phosphorescent material."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a general store? There's actually Seafarer's Bounty, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You make your way to the Seafarer's Bounty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, in the Open Quay, or "key."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll say that I give you everything for one Frumpkin summoning, which takes incense, and I'll just deduct that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk back into the somewhat scattered, cluttered pawn shop, if you will, and there within you see the older female gnome, Sheila Bobsnopper, who you've run in before previously, lean forward and, "Hi, can I help you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need ball bearings, lots more ball bearings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You ran out of ball bearings?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So yeah, do you sell bags of ball bearings? And also, bottle rockets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as the ball bearings go, I can get you... some."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have other fireworks other than bottle rockets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, there are a number of explosives "that we have for various celebrations."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, do you have a variety bag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How much do you have to spend?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any. I could buy you out. I could probably buy the shop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before she goes, she refills your bag of ball bearings to 630 ball bearings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have to look up again how much a bag of ball bearings is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, that's the offhand knowledge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're right, you're right, I apologize.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all right, just don't let it happen again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My inability-- I won't, I won't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you have no idea of how powerful these may be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been a pleasure doing business," and she wheels the cart in your direction--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I toss her five more gold as a tip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My goodness, so generous! "What's your name, if I might ask?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Parents really had a plan for you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Oh, well that's embarrassing, I'm so sorry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got a very memorable face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's on me, that's on me. Anyway."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need help with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm happy to. If you could just get this out of here as soon as possible "so as to not garner any suspicion. This is a lot of--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just a large amount draws a lot of attention that I don't want on me, "and on you, that's your problem, so." She's pushing it toward the door. (squeaking)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a cart, like a cart of fireworks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck are you going to do with a cart of fireworks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know the guy in Willy Wonka, who's pushing the cart with all the plates and shit hanging? "Nobody ever goes in!" (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll just stop at Nicodranas real quick, pick up a felony, no big deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, what's more Beauregard than that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's going to come home with a pet, is what I want to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to put them all on the Vault of Amber and someday have Astrid dispel and all these fireworks go (explosion).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I do need-- yeah, I find Fjord or Caleb, whoever has the bag of holding--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you attempting to be quiet with this? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe put your cloak over the cart at least?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Driving across state border. Okay, yeah, so I throw my cloak over just so it looks like laundry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you make your way towards the Lavish Chateau?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a Little Orphan Annie scheme.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, is that where they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, some people are out shopping, Caleb's buying all the paper in Nicodranas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice partway towards the Opal Archways that a handful of zhelezo are trailing you from about 25, 30 feet back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I just clock them as I keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and you make your way to where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know where people went? Did we all just scatter?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're a bunch of middle schoolers at a theme park.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We do need to get some healing potions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I went toy shopping and clothes shopping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll just head to the Lavish Chateau, wait out front. I know they'll be there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Excuse me, what are doing with this out front?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Carlos, hey, it's me, Beauregard with the Mighty Nein, friend of Jester?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I bring this inside real quick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for your watchful eye." They kind of, "All right," and they walk--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come see the Ruby of the Sea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but seriously, what did you bring?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just bought a bunch of fireworks, dude!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just don't put it near any of the lantern oil, please."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, sure, that makes sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're buying toys and clothes, you said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I'm going to buy some toys for my son, like a set of blocks, and some more targets for him to shoot at.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They've got these tops, when you spin them, they make more tops, those are pretty cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like to get matching family outfits, for a Christmas picture sort of a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between all the custom outfits, the toy purchases, I'll say it'll put you back two and a half gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: After I get done looking for diamonds with Caduceus I'm going to rush back to the Lavish Chateau so I can look for Bluud and try to hide from my mom and see if she is going to have any company tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you make your way up the staircase that leads to the secondary floor, you can see Bluud is sitting on the heavy stool, and he gets in a mode where he's kind of napping, but is still aware, you know? lines.text: For those who'd like to, you can just add a note into your equipment of miscellaneous fireworks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- breakfast had, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll make sure he thinks you're not interested.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. It's just that it's a possibility."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Casually curious about how he's doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll make sure to let him know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell him how pretty I looked, too."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And may I hold onto this?

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take the turtle, and I wrap it in the thong-- (laughter) and I store them away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) "I keep one of his, he keeps one of mine!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really where I have a problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm still ironing out the kinks, but with those things, we should be able to go to your home and Jester's home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have not tried it, but I think that I can-- I think that I can do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Once or twice a day, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a little, little bit of risk, depending on the place.

lines.text: Does it take a lot of energy to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it takes a lot of focus, and a lot of math is involved, but once you get it down rote, you have it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could end up inside of a brick wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And it can bring all of us all the time? Or just a couple of us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just building on everything I've done with the circles, except it just sort of opens that circle, and makes it wider.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so what if, say, we're traveling through Xhorhas, through the planes, and instead of camping with wild creatures at night, we can bamf here, sleep in pretty beds, and then we can just bamf back to where we were?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Depending on our day, you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I might need to hold onto that magic for other things, but...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Best to be a little conservative with it, I imagine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it is nice that we can now kill two birds with one stone, because you guys are neighbors, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In that case, do you think I could ask you a favor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Do you want the underwear back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could also just stay another night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't to hold you guys up, but...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we have stuff to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we have research to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have lots of things to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not a good researcher, if you want to just start without me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he just starts drawing on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you could send a message to Archivist Kathedoc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So heading to Rexxentrum is the intent here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This time, not riding on horses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Archivist Kathedoc! We are on our way to the teleportation circle within your...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, see you soon. Can't wait for the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We shall prepare for your arrival." That's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'm in a much safer place than you're going to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, I think we've just all been together for so long, so it just feels a bit odd.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. But you're going to come get me, like, tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll be back in no time.

lines.text: Do you have a way to reach out to Caleb or someone if something happens, or...?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In a pinch, I could go to Yussa, and I assume he could reach out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll make sure to send you a message tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that way you can let me know how it's going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys going to be okay in Rexxentrum wearing these clothes? These Xhorhasian clothes? You'll be okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already changed, just because it's been so hot lately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can take care of our first day, with your clothes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll put back on my Cobalt gear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I've got my high priestess dress on, technically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could pick up something once we're there, but I can take off the coat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Ollie's Overalls! Yeah, yeah, yeah. Great store.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (soft whooshing) Its energy disperses, and it is gone, and you're left alone with your family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, first, roll persuasion to see how good the seating is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, that is high fantasy in 2020.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus three? How did that happen? Whoa, 22!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Incredible ocean view. The best server.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know if the High Curator is in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would you wish to speak to them?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This library is massive, and gorgeous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This wasn't the one they attacked, was it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry it's such short notice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. I have not had an opportunity yet "to thank you for what you aided in not long ago." "to thank you for what you aided in not long ago."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was a bit chaotic last time we came through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How's the damage to the city? Doing better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In reading your files, "there is much spoken highly from Dairon of your work."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, ah... (laughs) I didn't expect anything less. Great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Along with quite a layer of impetuousness."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which is not always a bad thing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's been working out, you know? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You seem to have a crew here "that keeps a good head on your shoulders."

lines.text: We just got back from the middle of the Lucidian Ocean, like, yesterday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I've said I put on my robes before I came for...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put on my expositor gear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the rest of them, I don't know.

lines.text: "What can, hopefully, the Archive help with?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An Abyssal creature from the Astral Sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He came from the Astral Sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who went by the name Vokodo, and crash-landed on the island of Rexxentrum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are in Rexxentrum, thank you.

lines.text: You see Yudala trying to follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, fire poking out, and he had lots of arms, and he lived underwater.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: We all had this vision as we beat him of him fleeing a giant, moving city in the Astral Sea, and the phrase...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The nine eyes, more or less manifested in all of our consciousness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When she says a moving, living city, it was, like, the most terrifying, horrible moving, living city you could ever imagine, you know? Like, it felt like the buildings were organic, thinking and moving on their own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Breathing! It felt like they were breathing.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will get my best scholars on it."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(uncertain chuckle) "The pleasure is mine." Bows lower, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(hums) All right." And they immediately turn and (laughs) march off to their business as you watch them begin to point out and call over a few individuals and essentially begin prepping them on what is the requested intent of your arrival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know I don't really care about authority, but it's still, like, a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, the master curator of this branch.

lines.text: I kind of like the expositor life, because we're like the foot soldiers who go out and find shit.

lines.text: Are you now the Man? Is that the--?

lines.text: I've always been the man, Caduceus.

lines.text: Should probably examine that at some point.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Expositors generally work alone because that's the most effective means of them doing their work, unless they're paired off in times of extreme crisis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, normally the work-- Like, you would work with archivists when you're in the actual library, but otherwise, your purpose is to go out and acquire and bring back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you do me a favor? Would you all gather up for a moment? Good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You going to take our picture?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And do a little more shopping here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need some more paper?

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know that it matters, Fjord, after our peace deal at sea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. I feel like we may be swimming with sharks a little bit, and it's good to just get our feet wet, and get used to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe making some other friends here before we go right into the belly of the beast.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. See if anything's changed.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Where are you off to first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The-- you're referring of the Academy Grounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're looking to shop for anything of your regards, it'd be along the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So before you'd even get to the Academy Grounds, you'd pass through, from what you'd know, probably the Vigil Circle, which is a part of the Tangles, which is what you're already in, heading towards the Shimmer Ward would be your best bet to find a place that might be able to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would I know a shop that would have both magical scrolls, as well as items?

lines.text: There aren't many shops that sell magical scrolls because everything is very heavily controlled by the Assembly, specifically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pumat's place is a little looser because it's further south.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's further south, but here in Rexxentrum, the proximity is so close that most business has to go through the Academy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't visited there, but you passed by a number of times, known as Thaydeen's Endless Emporium of Enchanted Eccentricities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, I love this name.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say that name one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thaydeen's Endless Emporium of Enchanted Eccentricities.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's not much in Rexxentrum; there's just the most amazingly-named store.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would've. We would've gone and looked, knowing that we couldn't afford anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All manner of strange commerce takes place here and there are all sorts of weird buildings, as well as the Claykeep prison, which sits ominously in the center of it by the temple so that anyone who's doing business knows to not pilfer anything, because it's real quick to get over to where they'll be forever kept.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Elmer Fudd voice) You ever been to the Quakey prison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's this weird, large curtain with some gold rope trim that comes down and it just splits right to the front, where there is a door archway, and you see a sign above it, this arched sign that is beautifully painted, and it says the entire layered name across it of Thaydeen's Endless Emporium of Enchanted Eccentricities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're the kid who spends all their field trip money at the first stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all enter the interior of this location, you can see this is like a gaudy warehouse filled with shelves and shelves--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's missing, there's a lack of signs and it looks like a lot of it has been cleared out, though there are a number of things here and there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pat Fjord on the shoulder and just say: Fjord, your ring is really pretty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's very climate controlled in here now because of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Took me a minute to get there, but I got there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk through the center area, and there are layers of shelves that lead towards a center circular counter with a back exit portion, and as you all begin to step in and talk and look around you, the still silence in the chamber is broken by what sounds like (record player starting) and music starts playing, triggered by your arrival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you all stand now in the center of the Endless Emporium of Enchanted Eccentricities, you see who you assume to be Thaydeen there, arms out on the edges of the central counter, going, "So, what are you looking for, if I might ask, huh?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Big smile, wild eyes, and just happy to have customers at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's just us in the emporium.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is so big and so empty, it is off-putting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have just come from very far away, from the edge of civilization itself, so it's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not a couple blocks, it's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever heard of Rumblecusp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it is very nice now. If you're ever looking for somewhere to go, it's got a great resort.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we call you Miss Thaydeen or Dimble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Preferably Thaydeen, it's what I'm used to."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is your shop known for? I mean, what is it that people come to the Endless Emporium for most regularly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have anything that will help protect people's brains from being overtaken by, like, other people. Like, mind control?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does this do, pray tell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I want to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I call it the Ring of Spell-Splitting."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look inside this simple box and you see a gold and silver band that are just spiraling around each other, in a singular loop. Simple in some ways, but still very beautiful in its simplicity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there like a max, you know, strength of spell that it will work on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But it allows you, once a day, "to make it hit two instead of one."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And this is more for the sort of painful type of spell, perhaps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But if it has like more of a area, "not so much; it to be a specific target."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's a touch spell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if it's, like, a healing spell that you're just doing with one target, then it's two targets?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much, how much, how much, how much, how much are you asking for it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, aren't you just the eager beaver, huh? "I'll let this one go for "6000 gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 6000 gold pieces, that's a lot of gold pieces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, mind you, "I give discounts for those who buy in bulk, "and there are many other things to pick up around here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I said, stuffing my face with popcorn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This stone, when activated and thrown, "will emit a terrible odor within a specific radius, "making everyone around it unable to deal with it, "for the most part, have to vacate "or probably puke all over their shoes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) It's not what I thought you'd say with an oops-stone, but--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: "Smells like an oops." What's the chuckle dust?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the other thing you had?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So she twists it, and it immediately begins to just give off bright colored lights, like a disco.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a kaleidoscope of light within a 20-foot radius.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, this store is amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It can be used once a day."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I've got 11 chuckle dust pouches at the ready."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And the chuckle dust is 10 gold a pouch."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I take two of those oops-stones?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would definitely like an oops-stone as well, and a celebone, and the chuckle dust.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a celebone and a chuckle dust as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Celebones, 20 gold apiece, "so if you're going to buy one, pay up."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oops-stones are five gold apiece. That's 10 for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the celebone is how much, 100?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Imagine if you set off a bunch in an area."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many do you have left? Of the oops-stones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "26, that would put me at 17 left."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think we should buy some for Nott, so she can give them as a present or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's true, I bet Luc would love something--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we just buy all of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I will also take two celebones, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many celebones did you have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, are we going to buy all the celebones? We're going to buy all the celebones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 300 gold for all of the oops-stones, and how much, how many bags of chuckle dust?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 110 gold for the chuckle dust? What if we bought the whole lot? You said you would give a discount for bulk buying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Why didn't you just polymorph immediately when you were falling? Into like a bird or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because it's much easier for me to just "float for a bit and then return "by more instantaneous means."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you can be falling and then like, (poof) and you can transport back to here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I can glide myself down to a body of land "and then send myself back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, okay. I can do that, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "By that, we will take an icebreaker ship "to the westward way."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There, we will meet with some of the individuals "who have also tasked to help us with this "and make a plan from there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like we just got the itinerary for a dope fucking cruise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will whisk away to Palebank Village and then start moving snail mail on the ground then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed. We will meet up with Dagen Underthorn, "is our contact at Balenpost."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Upon a satisfactory journey "of which I deem, "your group is to be paid in full "75,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, you could buy lots of fire rings for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So do you find these terms acceptable?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds like it's going to be super dangerous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And your only mission is just an education-based one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To reach the heart of Foren.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And if anything notably dangerous "is uncovered of Aeorian technology, "to make sure does not fall into the hands of the Dynasty "and other factions that would see it "misused or against us."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have one more member to talk to, but I think they'll be agreeable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me know in advance please, as you did."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We wouldn't dream of just interrupting you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would recommend preparing some warm clothing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And do you think we should prepare to run into any Dynasty soldiers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who are we going to fucking run into? What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, it's not complicated; it's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we find stuff to kill a god, are you going to kill gods?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We had a very rough week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Less the soul, "more what the hand and mind can do."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to our journey, "and I hope you enjoyed the tea."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take some of these cookies with me? If you're not going to eat all of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Into the bag. The whole thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all look up, you all look at Jester during this and you look back to the chair and the chair's empty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As each candy was going into her bag, Sprinkle was just like, "I want it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys make your exit from the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You exit the tower. The door closes behind you, and now you stand among, on the street, here in the Candles, taking in the discussion you just had.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, much warmer than even when we were in Xhorhas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyone feel like going to Nicodranas for dinner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just thinking the same thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is it? What's it from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check the back of your binder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you slip something in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't hand you stuff across the table anymore because of the pandemic, so I had to get in there a while back and sneak it in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't touch it with your bare hand-- oh god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You may already be a winner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "As I suspected, it seems some pupils "can only thrive when you let them go "to find their own path a while."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I gather we both have much we would like to say."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll end tonight's episode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to check the back of mine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) He put this in there! He's an ad wizard! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, we'll pick up on there next episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is it Thursday yet? Good night.
